item.title: EKS Cluster Provisioning with VPC Configuration using Terraform
item.description: Terraform’s declarative approach allows to describe the infrastructure in a high-level manner where it evaluates the current state of the infrastructure and determines what actions need to be taken to reach the desired state. Also, its idempotent nature means that applying the same configuration multiple times will result in the same end state as applying it once. In this blog post I am going over how to setup EKS cluster using Terraform including all the pre-requistites of setting up VPC, SG etc.
